topic.title: Your zite have 2 critical bugs
topic.body:
1.    If you post a topic with lage description. The description characters does not shows correctly. With the original ZeroUp this is working perfectly. Try upgrage the code from original ZeroUp.

Try ro make a large topic.

Like topic name:

99999999999998888888888888877777777777666666666666655555555544444444443333333332222111111111

The last characters are not showing: 111111111

 2.   The search function can not search the users comments, only can search the topic words.

Another functions are fine. Great zite, hope you guys fix this bugs.
